roleset.name: make a soft swishing sound

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The sounds issuing from beyond -- winches whirring , men shouting -- indicated great activity and excited me .

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls sound_emission-43.2

predicate.note: Frames file for 'whir' based on sentences in brown.
